title: Johnson & Johnson cuts production of underperforming COVID vaccine: WSJ
author: Eric Sagonowsky
description: After mounting a large research and production effort in support of its COVID-19 vaccine, Johnson & Johnson is scaling back production because of low demand, The Wall Street Journal
